titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House with respect to maintaining the integrity of the Wallop-Breaux Trust Fund.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the executive branch should comply with the automatic appropriation provisions of the Wallop-Breaux Trust Fund (such Fund pertains to sport fish restoration).
